name: Saptarshi Debroy
content: Saptarshi Debroy Previous Next Welcome to my homepage. I am an Associate Professor of Computer Science at Hunter College and a member of Doctoral Faculties at The Graduate Center in The City University of New York (CUNY). I am the founder and director of Distributed Systems and Security (DiSSect) Laboratory and a member of the Computer Simulation, Stochastic Modeling and Optimization (CoSSMO) Laboratory at CUNY. Before joining CUNY, I was a Post-doctoral Fellow at University of Missouri (Mizzou). I completed my Ph.D. (2014) in Computer Engineering from University of Central Florida (UCF). Prior to that, I received my Master of Technology (2008) from Jadavpur University, Kolkata, India and Bachelor of Technology (2006) from Institute of Engineering and Management of West Bengal University of Technology, Kolkata, India. My Resume Full paper "Infer-EDGE: Dynamic DNN Inference Optimization in Just-in-time Edge-AI Implementations" is accepted for publication at IEEE/IFIP NOMS, 2025. Congratulations Motahare! Full paper "Adversarial Autoencoder based Model Extraction Attacks for Collaborative DNN Inference at Edge" is accepted for publication at IEEE/IFIP NOMS, 2025. Congratulations Manal! Poster paper "Reliable 3D Reconstruction for Ad-hoc Edge Implementations" is accepted for publication at ACM/IEEE SEC 2024. Congratulations Nurul! Full paper "Intent-driven Data Falsification Attack on Collaborative IoT-Edge Environments" is accepted for publication at ACM/IEEE SEC Workshop on Security and Privacy in Edge Computing (EdgeSP), 2024. Congratulations Shima! Full paper " EdgeRL: Reinforcement Learning-driven Deep Learning Model Inference Optimization at Edge" is accepted for publication at IEEE CNSM, 2024. Congratulations Motahare! Houchao Gan has joined DiSSect Lab as a full time PhD student. Sourya Saha has joined DiSSect Lab as a full time PhD student. NSF grant on "A Trustworthy and Privacy-preserving Framework for Latency-sensitive Video-enabled Health Incident-Response Applications" has been awarded.
